Email_1.Subject: Im Appalled!
Email_1.Body:
It is appalling when our system flags people
    that are completely innocent. I will tell the
    design team to work on the flagging algorithm.
            
    Your next assignment is ready in the Graph
    application.

Email_2.Subject: Murphy? More Than Meets The Eye?
Email_2.Body:
Why do I feel like there was more to Murphy
    than what you submitted? Just make sure you
    pay attention to all the details in the
    Desktop Extraction.
